Reviews.Title: Works Good
Reviews.Author: Brenda Boyd
Reviews.Content: Yep....Buy it if you need it!!!!!! Came on time and I an Happy. I have to say more to make

ProductInfo.Features:
IRIL114 adds night vision capabilities to standard CCTV cameras, water resistant and suitable for indoor/outdoor use
Built-in 114 pcs strong powered IR LEDs
Suitable for long distance (330 ft.), with 45° light angle
Storage temp: -22°F ~ 140°F. Operation temp: 14°F ~ 122°F.
Power: 12VDC(+/-10%)/1800mA (IR LED open). Auto Activated
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech IR Illuminator with 114 pcs IR LED, Water Resistant, Indoor/Outdoor Use, IR distance of 330 ft., 45° Light Angle for Surveillance Security Camera CCTV
